title: Kindergarten
text: Kindergartens are a type of early childhood education service that prepares children for school.

attributes.text: Most cater for children aged between two-and-a-half and five years.
Most have morning and afternoon sessions, but others provide extended sessions or all day education and care
Local (parent/whƒÅnau) committees support teachers in each kindergarten, and raise local funds and resources to support the kindergarten. Parents are also asked for financial donations.
